tool_description: Creates structured note templates and fills them with source information for consistent research documentation.

template_type.description: Type of note template (summary, analysis, critique, comparison, methodology)

source_title.description: Title of the source being documented

key_points.description: Key points to include in notes

error_messages: Invalid template type: Use summary, analysis, critique, comparison, or methodology.
Missing source information: source_title and source_authors are required.
Empty author list: At least one author must be provided.
Too many authors: Maximum 10 authors allowed.
Template creation failed: Unable to generate template with provided parameters.
usage: Specify template_type, source_title, and source_authors. Optionally include key_points, research_questions, methodology, and personal_comments to populate the template.

note_template.description: Formatted note template with source information

template_sections.description: List of sections included in the template

completion_status.description: Status of template completion (complete, partial, skeleton)
